title: Pros And Cons Of Owning Gold
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: Gold’s returns over time are unimpressive – if your comparison is stocks. But that’s not really the relevant comparison, and in fact, gold can facilitate your ownership of stocks. The portfolio purpose that gold ultimately serves is as a cash equivalent that beats inflation and as a store of value when your dollars are not holding up. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

itunes:summary:
Gold’s returns over time are unimpressive – if your comparison is stocks. But that’s not really the relevant comparison, and in fact, gold can facilitate your ownership of stocks. The portfolio purpose that gold ultimately serves is as a cash equivalent that beats inflation and as a store of value when your dollars are not holding up.
